Question
========

A researcher is interested in the relationship between age and blood pressure. He suspects that weight also plays a role in this. The effect of age on blood pressure appears to be partly via the effect of age on weight. What type of multivariate relationship is involved here? 
Answerlist
----------
* Spurious relationship
* Multiple causes
* Direct and indirect effects
* Chain relationship

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
